references.paper_title: A complete characterization of the gap between convexity and sos-convexity.
references.reason: This paper provides a complete characterization of the gap between convexity and sum-of-squares (SOS) convexity, a fundamental concept explored in the main paper.

This paper is one of the seminal papers introducing and showcasing the capabilities of Large Language Models (LLMs) as few-shot learners, which is highly related to the main paper's use of LLMs for problem-solving.

references.paper_title: Optimisation globale et théorie des moments.
references.reason: This paper is a seminal work on global polynomial optimization and the theory of moments, which is used in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Structured semidefinite programs and semialgebraic geometry methods in robustness and optimization.
references.reason: This paper offers a detailed work on semialgebraic geometry methods, which is one of the mathematical concepts that is used in the main paper.
This paper is David Hilbert's work, which involves polynomial optimization.
